title: Screenshots added to album but its not showing
content:
Dears

I have this problem only through Google photos app in my pixel, in another device like iPhone or laptop it's work perfectly. 

The problem is that the screenshots photos some of them if its backedup won't open or will opend but not it's not clear its will be still like downloading with the circle in the middle! 

Its with the most of the screenshots not all of them but the moooost!. 

Nothing wrong with network because its videos or another type of photos in the backup works perfectly except the screenshots from the pixel. 

And the Google photos app with all the photos and videos backedup with the screenshots of course with the same network will work perfectly with the iPhone and my HP laptop! 

As i see it if i moved the screenshots photos rom screenshots folder to folder i maid and then i backup the photos, and then i added the photos from the backup to album the photo want open in pixel its only work from another device. 

How can i fix this problem!
